titleStmt.title: Dictionary, Natural Sciences & Medecine, by Ariel

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary: A dictionary of natural sciences and medecine by Édouard Ariel. 1 page per entry. Header in latin.

extent.note: The leaves are broader in their middle than at their edges.

collation.desc: the front cover. Verso marbled. Shelfmark on spine and recto.
1 folio = front guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso. Recto marbled.
1 folio = Title Page. No foliation 1. f1v blank. 220 x 175 mm.
198 folios = Dictionary proper. Arabic pagination 1-392. 220 x 175 mm (various formats in facts; some folios folded).
1 folio = Title Page. No foliation 1. f1v blank. 220 x 175 mm.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
1 folio = back guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso. Verso marbled.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker: INDIEN 140 (front cover, verso).
BnF shelfmark in black pencil: Tamoul N° 140 (f[1]r).

binding.p: Marbled paper covers. Shelfmark on the spine.

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

provenance.p: Written by Edouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Edouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine (1912). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois et malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 26.
Vinson, Julien & Feer, Léon & s.n. (1866-). Catalogue des manuscrits tamoul et télinga. Manuscript, BnF Indien 577. — See f. 38rr, no. 140.
Vinson, Julien (1867). Catalogue des manuscrits tamouls. Corrected proofreadings printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)” — See p. 38, no. 140.
Vinson, Julien (n.d.). BnF Indien 1062, f54r, no. 140 141.

encodingDesc.p: Transliteration conventions ― Unmarked puḷḷi, ō, and ē restored. Uppercase for initial vowels (in excerpts only). ― Abbreviations ― c = column, f = folio, lf = library foliation = lm = left margin, r = recto, rm = right margin, U = unit (codicological and/or textual), v = verso.

text.body:
1 à 50
Dictionnaire
Répertoire
Dictionnaire
des sciences naturelles
& médicales
d’après les notions qu’en possèdent les Hindous répandues dans
l’Inde
& les principalement d’après
les traites en langue tamile.
blank

p. 1
Acidum sulphuricum.
Acid, Vitriolic.
Géndaga tràvagum kentakattirāvagam (Tam)
_ Gunduck Ka uttir. (DuK) _
Acidum sulphuricum. (1.)
préparé en brûlant
du soufre avec un peu de
terre.
. (1)
(K) Gandagattravakattirāvagam (gandhaka-
drāvaka).
kantakattirāvagam. EA.
(K) gandagaççéyanìr.
kantakaṭceyanīr.
p. 391
p. 392

body.seg:
Etudes sur la
l’histoire naturelle & la
Matière médicale
Indienne.
